title: wine_Conn_Creek_2007_Stagecoach_Vineyard_Cabernet_Sauvignon_(Atlas_Peak)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 83466.
country: US.
description: A tremendous Cabernet, showing the authority of its vineyard, high up in the Vaca Mountains. Dry and full-bodied, this wine is spectacularly rich in blackberries, cassis and minerals and is well oaked. What's most remarkable is the quality of the tannins. They're firm, yet soft and sweetly refined. A tremendous accomplishment, and should develop in the bottle for a decade. At this price, an outstanding value..
designation: Stagecoach Vineyard.
points: 96.
price: 45.0.
province: California.
region_1: Atlas Peak.
region_2: Napa.
